name: A game about outer space
description:
Push the lever on the top to extinguish the fire and run to the basement to recover the oxygen you are losing. To pause will have consequences!

The Team 

Programmers : Diego Javier Ríos Sánchez , Ezequiel Abraham Alemán Quintana. 

Composer: Enrique Sánchez  Sanabria.

Graphics: Paula chicote Barrios. 

This game was made in about 18 hours for the Island jam in Gran Canaria, Spain.
